          <title>
            <string language="es">Locuciones latinas</string>
            <string language="en">Latin phrases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lateinische Phrasen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expressions latines</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Frases latin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Frasi latine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λατινικές φράσεις</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Es el cuestionario de autoevaluación del tema. Consta de 10 preguntas en un sólo nivel. Sólo las hay de tipo potón de radio, casillas de verificación.</string>
            <string language="en">This is the final self evaluation test. It includes 10 questions in just one level. The answers are selected with radio buttons and checkboxes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Locuciones</string>
            <string language="en">Phrases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">latín</string>
            <string language="en">Latin</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist der abschließende Selbstauswertung 
Test. Es schließt 10 Fragen in gerade einer Stufe ein. 
Die Antworten werden mit Radiotasten und checkboxes ausgewählt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est l'essai final d'évaluation d'art de l'auto-portrait.
Il inclut 10 questions dans juste un niveau. Les réponses
sont choisies avec les boutons par radio et les checkboxes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é o teste final da avaliação de self. 
Inclui 10 perguntas em apenas um nível. As respostas são
selecionadas com teclas de rádio e checkboxes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è la prova finale di auto valutazione. 
Include 10 domande in appena un livello. Le risposte sono 
selezionate con i pulsanti di scelta ed i checkboxes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι η τελική μόνη δοκιμή αξιολόγησης. 
Περιλαμβάνει 10 ερωτήσεις σε μόνο ένα επίπεδο. Οι 
απαντήσεις επιλέγονται με τα ραδιο κουμπιά και τα τετραγωνίδια.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Phrasen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lateinisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expressions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
